bug.author: ashiqimranintel
bug.summary: ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1
bug.description:
Environment:
Framework: TensorFlow Framework version: 2.4 Horovod version: 0.20.0 and 0.20.3 MPI version: IntelMPI 2019 CUDA version: NCCL version: Python version: 3.7 Spark / PySpark version: OS and version: Ubuntu 18.04 OS GCC version: 8.1 CMake version: 3.11.4
Bug report: ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1: /../../../bin/python -u -c 'import sys, setuptools, tokenize; sys.argv[0] = '"'"'/tmp/pip-req-build-rp03q5ua/setup.py'"'"'; file='"'"'/tmp/pip-req-build-rp03q5ua/setup.py'"'"';f=getattr(tokenize, '"'"'open'"'"', open)(file);code=f.read().replace('"'"'\r\n'"'"', '"'"'\n'"'"');f.close();exec(compile(code, file, '"'"'exec'"'"'))' install --record /tmp/pip-record-9rme1nn8/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile --install-headers /../.../.../anaconda3/include/python3.7m/horovod Check the logs for full command output

comments.comment: Fixed this issue with gcc version 8.3, thanks
